title: Generate Standard SI Cascade Plots
text: goal cascade automatically generate cascade plots

title: Generate Standard SI Cascade Plots
text: can install development version cascade like :
code: # installing from OHA GH page  install.packages("devtools")  devtools::install_github("USAID-OHA-SI/cascade")

title: Generate Standard SI Cascade Plots
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(cascade) library(gaglr)   # Setup local paths where msds live   merdata <- file.path(glamr::si_path("path_msd"))   file_path <- return_latest(folderpath = merdata, pattern = "PSNU_IM_FY20-23_20220812_v1_1_Zambia")  # load msd to be used   df <- read_msd(file_path)  # populate all the metadata needed for cascade   gophr::get_metadata(file_path)  # Check cascades avaible for creation   plot_name  # Return a cascade data frame (number corresponds to position in char list) # 1 = Standard cascade   return_cascade(df, 1)  # Plot the cascade # You will be promted to enter a cascade number   return_cascade_plot(df, export = F)

what:
Batch cascade plot
Returns a plot for all cascades generated by the package. A quick way to produce
all permutations of cascade plots. User passes an msd data frame and plots are
returned for USAID only for all cascades. — batch_cascade_plot
title:
Batch cascade plot
Returns a plot for all cascades generated by the package. A quick way to produce
all permutations of cascade plots. User passes an msd data frame and plots are
returned for USAID only for all cascades. — batch_cascade_plot

what:
Batch plot
Helped function that is used in the batch_cascade_plot. Takes a data frame,
cascade number, plot file type, and image path. Returns a ggplot2 object. — batch_plot
title:
Batch plot

text: Batch plot Helped function used batch_cascade_plot. Takes data frame, cascade number, plot file type, image path. Returns ggplot2 object.

title:
Batch plot
Helped function that is used in the batch_cascade_plot. Takes a data frame,

code: batch_plot(   msd_df,   cscd_num,   export = TRUE,   imgtype = ".png",   imgpath = "Images" )

title:
Batch plot
Helped function that is used in the batch_cascade_plot. Takes a data frame,
cascade number, plot file type, and image path. Returns a ggplot2 object. — batch_plot
text: msd_df msd based data frame passed cascade call cscd_num number cascade plot see plot_name crosswalk export logical control saving plot, TRUE default imgtype type image save (default = .png, .svg, .jpeg,) imgpath path images saved ("Images" set default)

what:
Plot Cascade
plot_cascade is a ggplot2-based plot that arranges, annotates and
plots data from the 90-90-90 cascade. Four inputs are required to create
a valid plot. — plot_cascade
